blogs.title: A question about RESTful APIs
blogs.author: J.K. Rowling
blogs.body: REST (Representational State Transfer is an architectural style for building web services that allows for the creation, retrieval, updating, and deletion of resources over the HTTP protocol. A RESTful API is a web service that adheres to the principles of REST.

blogs.title: Using Markdown for writing blog posts
blogs.author: A.H. Mohamed
blogs.body: Markdown is easy Markdown is a lightweight markup language that is commonly used for writing blog posts, documentation, and other types of text-based content. It is designed to be easy to read and write, with a simple syntax that allows you to format text without the need for complex HTML tagsto use and produces clean HTML output.

blogs.title: The Killer
blogs.author: Abdinasir Abdi
blogs.body: Solitary, cold, methodical and unencumbered by scruples or regrets, a killer waits in the shadows, watching for his next target. Yet, the longer he waits, the more he thinks he's losing his mind, if not his cool.
